details.title: Nucleolar organizer regions in oreochromis nilotica chromosomes
details.abstract: The nucleolar organizer regions (NORs) in the mitotic chromosomes of til apia Oreochromis niloticus were analyzed using silver nitrate staining Ag-detected NORs (Ag-NORs) in the chromosomes of the tilapia exhibited heteromorphism. Individual Ag-NORs sizes var ied on different chromosomes, and the number of Ag-NOR per cell varied from three to six. Arrong the gnomes ned 100 cells, 71% of the gnomes carried four Ag-IDRs, 12% carried 3, 11% carried 5, and 6% occurred 6. The variance occurred not only among different cells but also among different cells from the same soiree. The satellite ite association between horrologous chromosomes in No 7 was also observed in 27% of the metaphase chromosome preparations. The heteromorphic properties es of Ag-NORs were discussed.
